variables.name: Terminal
variables.description: The last command executed by the terminal

commands.name: cr
commands.expand: Please refer to the provided reference information, and conduct a thorough code review, highlighting improvements, potential bugs, and optimizations based on your analysis.

commands.name: tests
commands.expand: Please refer to the provided reference information, and generate comprehensive unit tests to validate functionality, including edge cases, based on your understanding of the code.

commands.name: explain
commands.description: Explain how the selected code works
commands.expand: Please refer to the provided reference information, and clearly explain the code's logic, purpose, and key components in your own words.

commands.name: fix
commands.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code
commands.expand: Please refer to the provided reference information to fix my code.

tools.name: semantic_search
tools.description: Run a natural language search for relevant code or documentation comments from the user's current workspace. Returns relevant code snippets from the user's current workspace if it is large, or the full contents of the workspace if it is small.
